N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 47.2 - Vehicles subject to law

State Regulations
(a) The rearmost wheels of the following vehicles or combinations are required to
be equipped with splash guards: (1)
commercial
trucks; (2)
combinations of a
commercial truck and trailer, and including a utility or house trailer drawn by
a commercial truck; (3)
combinations of a tractor and semitrailer; and
(4)
tractors operating without a
semitrailer. (b) The
following vehicles or combinations are not required to be equipped with splash
guards: (1)

Combinations of passenger car and
trailer. (2)

Suburban vehicles or
station wagons. (3)

Vehicles or
combinations designated as "special purpose commercial" motor vehicles, and
registered under schedule F of subdivision 7 of section
401
of
the Vehicle and Traffic Law. (c) Splash guards are not required on
vehicles so designed and constructed that the requirements set forth in section
47.3
of this Part are accomplished
by reason of fender or body construction or other means of enclosure. Notes
